title: An optimized impedance matching construction strategy: carbon nanofibers inlaid with Ni nanocrystals by electrospinning for high-performance microwave absorber
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20683-20690
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03367A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Danfeng Zhang, Heng Gao, Congai Han, Guoxun Zeng, Qibai Wu
With the widespread use of electronic goods, solving electromagnetic pollution has become one of the new challenges. This paper fabricated Ni/C nanofibers and results indicate that it is promising for MAM application with excellent MA performance.
